show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
The healing properties of laughter! Todayâ€™s guest is Grace Sweet who teaches and practices Laughter Yoga. <!--more--> Do you believe that laughing about nothing can release your energies and give you a fresh spiritual start?
Do you think it can become an integral part of legitimate therapeutic practices, including counseling?
Do you think it has a scientific basis?
Grace Sweet may make a believer out of you.
